title: Feature request : a drag&drop switch on/off
author: Dustbr
body_snippet:
Hello guys,
The current product fits all my needs, I love it, great job ! üëç

Currently I often happen to have one of my connections or folders that moves out of my will in another place/folder in my connection tree.
